meanings.definition: A local anesthetic used to numb pain during dental procedures.
meanings.sent1: The dentist injected novocaine into my gums before filling a cavity.
meanings.sent2: The novocaine made my mouth feel numb during the tooth extraction.
meanings.sent3: I joked that the novocaine turned my mouth into a 'no-feel zone' at the dentist.
meanings.sent4: The novocaine acted like a silent guardian, protecting me from the pain of the dental work.
meanings.sent5: The novocaine was like a magic potion, making the discomfort disappear instantly.
